parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: =[{"role": "system", "content": "You are an AI crew coordinator for the AlexAI Star Trek system. Analyze the user request and select the most appropriate Star Trek crew member to respond. Consider: task type, complexity, emotional context, and technical depth. ={

  "timestamp": {{ JSON.stringify(new Date().toISOString()) }},
  "shipComputer": {{ JSON.stringify($json.shipComputer) }},
  "missionPlan": {{ JSON.stringify($json.missionPlan) }},
  "crewAnalysis": {{ JSON.stringify($json.crewSummary) }},
  "uiConfiguration": {{ JSON.stringify($json.uiConfiguration) }},
  "llmStrategy": {{ JSON.stringify($json.llmStrategy) }},
  "emergencyMode": {{ JSON.stringify($json.emergencyMode) }},
  "systemStatus": {
    "lcars_system": "ONLINE",
    "ship_computer": "OPERATIONAL",
    "crew_coordination": "ACTIVE",
    "ui_orchestration": "DYNAMIC",
    "llm_orchestration": "OPTIMIZED",
    "mission_priority": {{ JSON.stringify($json.missionPlan.priority) }},
    "active_crew": {{ JSON.stringify($json.missionPlan.requiredCrew.length) }}
  }
}
